ygData.subject: Re: xp at 24?
ygData.msgSnippet: where i am hunting now and have been since 24 is between a few spots, all in same area, rth mts-great exp-solo or group for giant skullys-also group for
ygData.messageBody:
where i am hunting now and have been since 24 is between a few spots, all in
same area, rth mts-great exp-solo or group for giant skullys-also group for
cyclopes-excellent exp........aviack city-always decent exp
here.........paw-outside-wonderful exp here-grouped with at least 2 others,
the outside is great exp also-inside go ot in a full group and WITH
tanks.......i am finding it easy to do paw in its various spots, LOL but i
do tend to stay outside as inside scares lvl 40's sometimes.....Clerics are
always a welcome addition in these place so you should have no trouble
getting into a group...one for place in rth mts is the ruins, not by the
tower but the other ruins-very goos exp there........
Topaaz SpellBinder
Rokking at 27
Xegony


>From: "Jeff Portwine" <jdport@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] xp at 24?
>Date: Tue, 4 Jan 2000 18:30:38 -0500
>
> >friends all want to do Cazic Thule, but I find it so incredibly
> >boring. I was thinking Unrest, but I have so many bad memories of
> >such bad trains there. Seems like Runnyeye might be good, but not too
>
>
>I found that unrest was very good for me up until about 26... at which
>point
>I went to Cazic until I was around 32 or so... If Cazic is boring then you
>are doing somethin wrong because there is usually a LOT of action there...
>sometimes too much =) I certainly don't think it's any more boring than
>any other zone. Unrest trains can be bad, but
>the best way to level there is to join a group in a room in a house and
>once
>you are settled in a room (I leveled up to 26 fairly quickly in the hand
>room) there are usually no trains. Every zone is bad with trains if you
>try
>to fight in the first open area you come to near the zone. Also, when you
>get in high 20's, low 30's I know a GREAT place to level. I almost hate to
>say anything for fear of a terrific (if a little boring) spot geting over
>crowded... but the icy orc camp in everfrost is a very safe place to group
>with excellent xp. I didn't find this place until level 33 and leveld to
>35
>in 2 days there.
>
>
> > Paw and Mistmoore are still too high/tough. I heard Sol A might be
> >good, but I've never been to Lavastorm, and worry about falling into
> >lava as I've heard you're oft to do when zoning into the place. Maybe
>
>
>Paw and MM are too tough as you said... Sol A is ok if you get a good
>group,
>but I'd get a couple more levels first. As for zoning into lava, i've
>never
>heard that nor have I ever seen that... the lava is no where near the zone
>of nektulos/lavastorm... (though there is a huge pit right out side the
>zone
>to Sol A and Sol B)
>
> >the giant skels in Rathe mountains? Maybe pickclaws in highkeep?
>
>
>pickclaws are very good at your level, but that area tends to be HORRIBLY
>crowded (at least on my server) and you are very lucky if you can even get
>in a group there.
>
>-Eachann Bronzeleaf
>-35th cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr
>
>
><< text3.html >>
